messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] FL Unschooling friendly umbrella/intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m Leslie, from Flower Mound, TX, north of Dallas/Ft. Worth.   Can t remember if I ve already sent an intro, so if I have, hi again.  I m  unschooling mom
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I'm Leslie, from Flower Mound, TX, north of Dallas/Ft. Worth. Can't
remember if I've already sent an intro, so if I have, hi again. I'm unschooling
mom of three daughters, Katelyn, 21, Jackie, 19, and Cassandra, 14.

Karen - Katelyn unschooled herself from age 15 and was accepted in college
at 17. We lived in Colorado, which has all sorts of rules about curriculum
and standardized testing, so we enrolled in an awesome umbrella school in Grand
Junction. (We lived in Denver, a couple hundred miles away.) It's called
West River Academy, and it's run by Peggy Nishikawa. Email:
_WRAcademy@..._ (mailto:WRAcademy@...) . Peggy is fantastic, and has all sorts of
knowledge to share. I don't know if she enrolls out-of-state residents, but
you could ask her. If not, I'm sure she'd know something about what's
available in your area.

We have a local support group based in Flower Mound (just north of DFW
Airport): DFWSaFE Zone (Dallas/Ft. Worth School-Free Education Zone). Any
unschooling or very relaxed eclectic types in this area are welcome to check us out
at _DFWSaFE@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:DFWSaFE@yahoogroups.com) .

Good luck!

Leslie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
